name: 14.14-Fastx tool kit: FASTQ to FASTA
description: Convert FASTQ files to FASTA files

parameters.name: Input
parameters.description: FASTA/Q input file. default is STDIN

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: FASTA output file. default is STDOUT

parameters.name: Verbose
parameters.description: Verbose - report number of sequences. If [-o] is specified,  report will be printed to STDOUT. If [-o] is not specified (and output goes to STDOUT), report will be printed to STDERR
